body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}


In this conversation, the agent's name is Joe Ramirez and the customer's name is Christine Long.  The conversation is about Happy Animal Shelter (a Animal Shelter ) and is a conversation about typical situation.The customer is feeling {emotion}.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello! Thank you for calling ABC Customer Service. My name is John. How can I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi John, I need some help with my recent order.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I’m happy to help with that. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Emily. Could you please provide me with your order number?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Yes, it's one two three four five six.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Got it. For verification purposes, could you also share your email address associated with the order?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for the information, Emily. I will look into your order details now.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Alright, Emily, I have all the details I need. Thank you for your patience. Is there anything else I can assist you with?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: No, that's all I needed. Thank you for your help, John.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome, Emily. Thank you for your time today. Have a great day!
